title: F1's next generation: the young F2 drivers backed by GP teams
summary: From Red Bull to McLaren, F1 teams are backing promising young talent with junior driver programmes. Meet the F2 hotshots jostling for a place on the Formula 1 grid

qa_pairs.question: Which Formula 1 team is known for its strong junior driver programme that has produced several successful drivers?
What is the primary purpose of junior driver programmes in Formula 1?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: To develop and promote young racing talent to the F1 grid
wrong_options: To provide financial support to struggling teams
To create partnerships with other motorsport series

qa_pairs.question: Which racing series do many young drivers compete in before moving to Formula 1?
